GroupCensus.name: GroupCensus
GroupCensus.description: Represents a snapshot of statistics about eligible members (employees or members) of a group (employer or association) and their legal dependents. Use this entity in quoting, rating, and the subsequent enrollment process. Child object of employer or group Account.

AccountId.description: Group account associated with the census.

ContractId.description: The contract associated with the census.

EffectiveEndDate.description: Effective end date of the census.

EffectiveStartDate.description: Effective start date of the census.

ExternalIdentifier.description: External ID used to identify the group census in search. Used as a cross reference field if the group census is externally imported.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record

MbrWithMoreThan1ChldCount.description: Number of members who have one or more children as dependents. Use in tier-based rating during quote and contract.

MbrWithMoreThan2ChldCount.description: Number of members who have two or more children as dependents. Use in tier-based rating during quote and contract.

MbrWithoutDependentCount.description: Number of single members who haven't declared any dependents for plan enrollment.

MemberOptOutCount.description: Number of members who have opted out of plan enrollment and don't want to participate in the employer's benefits program.

MemberWithDependentCount.description: Number of members who have dependents and no spouse.

MemberWithOneChildCount.description: Number of members who have only one child as a dependent. Use in rating during quote and contract.

MemberWithSpouseCount.description: Number of members who have a spouse and no dependents.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who currently owns this account.

SourceSystemName.description: The source system of the census.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the census.

Type.description: Specifies the stage this census is mapped to.

UsageType.description: Internal field. Specifies the application using the group census to populate data.
